CustomField.description: Formula field representing the value displayed on the Services Revenue Forecast page for this forecast summary category. If an override value is present, it is displayed. If no override value is present, the sum of the roll-up variance and original forecast value is displayed. If there is no override value or roll-up variance, the original forecast value is displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field representing the value displayed on the Services Revenue Forecast page for this forecast summary category.
CustomField.label: Adjusted Value
